subject: Support with debit card purchases - Barclays
mailbody:
Recent transactions on your Barclays Debit Card requires authorisation,





Click the 'Security' section below to review your records.

Barclays online team

subject: Re: Support with debit card purchases - Barclays
mailbody:
Hello,
Can you give me some more info about what you're offering? Specifically, how does it apply to our business? How can we use this?

Kerstin Jackson
